all.verRes: 50 z-vertical layers; top grid cell 0-10 m; []
all.vertK: shear mixing ([Large et al., 1994](https://doi.org/10.1029/94RG01872)) + tide mixing ([Simmons et al., 2004](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.dsr2.2004.09.015)) + constant background diffusivity 3e-5 m-2 s-1 >30N/S, tapering to 1.5e-5 m-2 s-1 at equator with vertical [Bryan and Lewis, 1979](https://doi.org/10.1029/JC084iC05p02503) profile
all.volcFo: prescribed aerosol optical properties ([Sato et al., 1993 updated](https://doi.org/10.1029/93JD02553) and [Stenchikov et al., 1998](https://doi.org/10.1029/98JD00693))

all.verRes: 50 z-vertical layers; top grid cell 0-10 m; []
all.vertK: shear mixing ([Large et al., 1994](https://doi.org/10.1029/94RG01872)) + tide mixing ([Simmons et al., 2004](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.dsr2.2004.09.015)) + constant background diffusivity 3e-5 m-2 s-1 >30N/S, tapering to 1.5e-5 m-2 s-1 at equator with vertical [Bryan and Lewis, 1979](https://doi.org/10.1029/JC084iC05p02503) profile
all.volcFo: prescribed aerosol optical properties ([Sato et al., 1993 updated](https://doi.org/10.1029/93JD02553) and [Stenchikov et al., 1998](https://doi.org/10.1029/98JD00693))

all.verRes: 50 z-vertical layers; top grid cell 0-10 m; []
all.vertK: shear mixing ([Large et al., 1994](https://doi.org/10.1029/94RG01872)) + tide mixing ([Simmons et al., 2004](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.dsr2.2004.09.015)) + constant background diffusivity 3e-5 m-2 s-1 >30N/S, tapering to 1.5e-5 m-2 s-1 at equator with vertical [Bryan and Lewis, 1979](https://doi.org/10.1029/JC084iC05p02503) profile
all.volcFo: prescribed aerosol optical properties ([Sato et al., 1993 updated](https://doi.org/10.1029/93JD02553) and [Stenchikov et al., 1998](https://doi.org/10.1029/98JD00693))

all.aerInd: yes, based on bulk mass concentration
all.antAer: emission-driven based on [Lamarque et al., 2010](https://doi.org/10.5194/acp-10-7017-2010) (full chemistry)
all.verRes: 50 z-vertical layers; top grid cell 0-10 m; []
all.vertK: shear mixing ([Large et al., 1994](https://doi.org/10.1029/94RG01872)) + tide mixing ([Simmons et al., 2004](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.dsr2.2004.09.015)) + constant background diffusivity 3e-5 m-2 s-1 >30N/S, tapering to 1.5e-5 m-2 s-1 at equator with vertical [Bryan and Lewis, 1979](https://doi.org/10.1029/JC084iC05p02503) profile
all.volcFo: prescribed aerosol optical properties ([Sato et al., 1993 updated](https://doi.org/10.1029/93JD02553) and [Stenchikov et al., 1998](https://doi.org/10.1029/98JD00693))

all.verRes: 59 rho2000 layers + 4 z-like layers in upper boundary (rho2000 = potential density referenced to 2000dbar); top grid cell 0-10 m; []
all.vertK: shear mixing ([Jackson et al., 2008](https://doi.org/10.1175/2007JPO3779.1)) + tide mixing ([Simmons et al., 2004](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.dsr2.2004.09.015)) + bottom boundary layer [Legg and Huijts, 2006](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.dsr2.2005.09.014) + constant background diffusivity 2e-5 m-2 s-1 >30N/S, tapering to 2e-6 m-2 s-1 at equator
all.volcFo: prescribed aerosol optical properties ([Sato et al., 1993 updated](https://doi.org/10.1029/93JD02553) and [Stenchikov et al., 1998](https://doi.org/10.1029/98JD00693))

all.verRes: 59 rho2000 layers + 4 z-like layers in upper boundary (rho2000 = potential density referenced to 2000dbar); top grid cell 0-10 m; []
all.vertK: shear mixing ([Jackson et al., 2008](https://doi.org/10.1175/2007JPO3779.1)) + tide mixing ([Simmons et al., 2004](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.dsr2.2004.09.015)) + bottom boundary layer [Legg and Huijts, 2006](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.dsr2.2005.09.014) + constant background diffusivity 2e-5 m-2 s-1 >30N/S, tapering to 2e-6 m-2 s-1 at equator
all.volcFo: prescribed aerosol optical properties ([Sato et al., 1993 updated](https://doi.org/10.1029/93JD02553) and [Stenchikov et al., 1998](https://doi.org/10.1029/98JD00693))

all.aerInd: yes; based on bulk mass concentration
all.antAer: emission-driven based on input4MIPs; CM4 has simplified chemistry
all.frzEqn: T_Fr = dTFr_dS * S + dTFr_dp * pres; dTFr_dS = -0.054, dTFr_dp = -7.75e-8, pres = gauge pressure (Pa)
all.mldSch: energy based boundary layer ([Reichl and Hallberg, 2018](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ocemod.2018.10.004])
all.verRes: 75 hybrid layers (z* and rho2000); top grid cell 0-2 m; []
all.vertK: shear mixing ([Jackson et al., 2008](https://doi.org/10.1175/2007JPO3779.1]), + tide mixing ([Melet et al., 2013](https://doi.org/10.1175/JPO-D-12-055.1)), + constant background diffusivity 1.5e-5 m-2 s-1 >30n/S, tapering to2e-6 m-2 s-1 at equator
all.volcFo: prescribed aerosol optical properties based on input4MIPs [ETH ZÃ¼rich (ETHZ), 2017](https://doi.org/10.22033/ESGF/input4MIPs.1681)

all.volcFo: prescribed aerosol optical properties [Sato et al., 1993 updated](https://doi.org/10.1029/93JD02553) and [Stenchikov et al., 1998](https://doi.org/10.1029/98JD00693)
